question_stem:
Question 4
Select the correct interpretation for the coefficient of Age.
A
Each 1 year increase in Age increases the log-odds of customer churn by 0.157
B
Each 1 year decrease in Age decreases the log-odds of customer churn by 0.157
C
Each 1 year increase in Age decreases the probability of customer churn by a factor of 0.855.
D
Each 1 year increase in Age decreases the odds of customer churn by a factor of 0.855.
